item.description:
@_jeba wrote:

client.java:6702: ‘;’ expected
return “Are you sure you want to destroy this item!”;

^the above is in your errors. take the time to read them, your issue is right there

Read full topic

item.title: 2 simple errors?
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

the reason u get this error

client.java:6702: illegal start of type return "Are you sure you want to destroy this item!"; ^
is because, well basically when you state “return” its the same as saying if this is the situation then do this

so its like instead of saying

“if a player deletes a certain item, ask them if they are sure they want to destroy it.”

it says

“ask them if they are sure they want to destroy it.”

while there are no problems for you since you created this code the server has no idea why u want to say that

basically… just give it a case statement and itll work… as for the ; you shouldnt need that once u add the case.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 simple errors?
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

It’s saying that you can’t start that line with “return” and that after “return” requires a “;”

^^Atleast… I’m pretty sure.^^

Read full topic

item.title: 2 simple errors?
item.dc:creator: @de_dust89 de dust89
item.description:
@de_dust89 wrote:

Well there is 2 simple errors from 100, but i need help with this…

    public String getMessageA(int itemID){
        switch(itemID){
            case 6570: return "You can get another from the Fight";
            case 4045: return "You can get another from the wizard at Home";
            case 4046: return "You can get another from the wizard at Home";
            case 15004: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15005: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15006: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15007: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15008: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15009: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15010: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15011: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15012: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15013: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15014: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15016: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15016: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";
            case 15018: return "You can get another one from the donator shop";

        }
}
        return "Are you sure you want to destroy this item!";
        public String getMessageB(int itemID){
        switch(itemID){
            case 6570: return "Caves minigame.";
        }
        return "";
    }

and the errors are…

client.java:6702: illegal start of type
        return "Are you sure you want to destroy this item!";
        ^
client.java:6702: ';' expected
        return "Are you sure you want to destroy this item!";
              ^
2 errors
Finished!
